CustomField.description: The system automatically populates this optional lookup field to link new Other Property Details records that capture additional property details to the Other Collateral records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This optional lookup field links the Other Property Details records that capture granular details that the system does not capture in Possessory, Real Estate, Titled, or UCC Collateral records to the Other Collateral records.
CustomField.label: Other Property Details
